fr.iutvalence.m3tplayer.core

Class Library

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.iutvalence.m3tplayer.core.Library
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Playlist

    public class Library
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the library of the player.

      Library()
      Initializes the library.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Library

        public Library()
        Initializes the library. If a library has been set before, it loads it, else, it creates a new one.

    • Method Detail

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Checks if the library is empty
        Returns:
        true if the library is empty, false if not.

      • loadMediaFromFile

        public void loadMediaFromFile()
        Loads all the medias which were saved into the library. It is used at the creation of the library object.

      • importWithoutAddingToFile

        public void importWithoutAddingToFile(Media media)

      • getMediaNode

        public org.jdom2.Element getMediaNode(int id)
        Returns the media node which maches with a given id
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the media
        Returns:
        The media node if the id maches with. Else it returns null if there is no match

      • importMedia

        public void importMedia(java.lang.String path)
        Imports a media into the library file
        Parameters:
        media - The media object to import

      • updateMedia

        public void updateMedia(int id,
                        java.util.Map<MediaInformation,java.lang.String> informations)
                 throws UnknownMediaException
        Update a specified media
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the media
        informations - Map with the informations to update.
        Throws:
        UnknownMediaException - Raised if there is no media matches with the id

      • getMedia

        public Media getMedia(int id)
        Returns a media by its given id
        Parameters:
        id - The media's ID
        Returns:
        The media which matches with the ID, or null if there is no match

      • getMediaId

        Returns:
